code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Grid,Avatar,Typography,CircularProgress}from"@mui/material";import BotAvatar from"../Assets/BotAvatar.svg";import PdfIcon from"../Assets/pdf_logo.svg";import{BOTMESSAGE_BACKGROUND}from"../utilities/constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BotFileCheckReply(_ref){let{message,fileName,fileStatus}=_ref;const messageAlignment="flex-start";const[animationState,setAnimationState]=useState("checking");useEffect(()=>{let timeout;if(animationState==="checking"){if(fileStatus==="File page limit check succeeded."){timeout=setTimeout(()=>setAnimationState("success"),1000);}else if(fileStatus==="File size limit exceeded."||fileStatus==="Network Error.
